bug.author: AlexDBlack
bug.summary: UI + Spark: stats display broken when collected once per averaging
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/2360237/21580069/353a34e6-d02b-11e6-802f-19c3a079374a.png></denchmark-link>
Here: all points are being mapped to position 5 for display, rather than positions 5, 10, 15, 20, etc. Multiple stats collections per averaging seems to display OK.

comments.comment: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
